abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan would provide
            financing of part of a three-year lending program of 5 to 15
            years loans to help finance investment programs of small and
            medium-size individual farmers and cooperatives. The loan
            would finance the development of livestock farming, annual
            crop production, perennial crops and agro-industrial development.

0.cdata!:
Evaluacion del proyecto de credito
            agropecuario - Peru

abstracts.cdata!:
This report appraises an Agricultural
            Credit Project for which a Bank loan of US$25 million
            equivalent is proposed. The loan would support a three year
            lending program of the Banco de Fomento Agropecuario del
            Peru (BFA) for medium- and long-term investments in
            agriculture, encompassing livestock and agro-industry to be
            made by small farmers, including cooperatives, borrower with
            government bearing the exchange risk.
